tasks.desc: Create and register new routines for diagnostics, onboarding, syncing, recovery, evaluation.
Improve documentation with agent-focused indexes, onboarding summaries, and visual maps.
Assume each agent identity, validate its checklist, tools, pipelines, and improve based on gaps.
Scan all pipelines for missing links, unused agents, and execution readiness.
Automate self-refresh of task list based on active heuristics, schedules, and logs.
Ensure goals and plans are in sync with current agent capabilities and memory.
Enforce file placement, naming, and versioning policies for long-term stability.
Ensure each agent’s documents, heuristics, pipelines, tasks, and checklists are up to date.
